title: Note the use of React.cloneElement to remove the props from the child
c
tag - because props are immutable, these values cannot be changed directly. Instead, a clone without these props must be used.

inline_content.Text: Note the use of React.cloneElement to remove the props from the child
tag - because props are immutable, these values cannot be changed directly. Instead, a clone without these props must be used.
